summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3071, for the improvement of East Forty-first Street and East Forty-second Street, each from Tenth Avenue Northeast to Eleventh Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37277 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
